title: I Raised a Nine Tailed Fox Wrongly - Novel Updates
tags: Abandoned Children   Animal Rearing   Beasts   Beautiful Female Lead   Cohabitation   Cold Protagonist   Dreams   Female Protagonist   Fox Spirits   Handsome Male Lead   Knights   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Monsters   Orphans   Power Couple   Priests   Stoic Characters   Tragic Past
author: Danaman   다나안
description:
Scyllia is a noble Paladin of the Western Continent.

While subjugating the smuggled monsters, she felt the unusual energy of a monster fox , so she found a priestess of the Eastern continent to ask about it.


“It’s a terrifying nine-tailed-fox. If you don’t want to see it become a demon of hell raise it yourself and bring it to the East Continent.” 


So she raised and taught the fox with effort…


“I am of a race greater than that of a beast. Scyllia knows that, right?”

“……”

“Don’t worry. You taught me well. I don’t do anything dangerous.”

“……”

“But you can’t run away.”

Power entered his thick and tense forearms that tightened her.

“Keep helping me to be a nice person, Scyllia. By my side.” 


Forever.


A nine-tailed-fox that is naturally bewitching and eats people.

The boy who grew up to be huge, refused to become independent.. 

With a face that was so lewd that the discipline she had been teaching in the past would be in vain.>
